title: FIESTA BEEF MEDLEY
directions: Brown beef with onion and garlic in a large skillet with a cover.
Stir in tomatoes, water, soy sauce and pepper; bring to a boil.
Mix in green beans and rice.
Cover; reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes or until rice is tender.
ingredients: 1⁄2 cup uncooked rice, washed and drained
Brown beef with onion and garlic in a large skillet with a cover.
Stir in tomatoes, water, soy sauce and pepper; bring to a boil.
Mix in green beans and rice.
Cover; reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes or until rice is tender.
